channel.title: [PI] 317 farcasting/range doesnt work

item.title: [PI] 317 farcasting/range doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @unearthyou unearthyou
item.description:
@unearthyou wrote:

When casting/ranging you run up to npc’s/players, before you say it, yes i used the fix for farcasting

if(usingBow || c.usingMagic || c.autocasting || usingOtherRangeWeapons) { c.mageFollow = true; } else { c.mageFollow = false; }

Doesnt work, still run up to npc’s/players when you cast/use range

Not quite sure how to fix this ive looked everywhere (literally) this is my CombatAssistant.java

combatassis - Pastebin.com

Help :S

Read full topic
